item.description:
You are invited to A Weekend of Light with H. H. Sant Rajinder Singh Ji Maharaj

This is a unique opportunity to find out why he is revered by seekers and respected by spiritual leaders as one of the great spiritual Masters of our time. Whether you are an experienced meditator or just beginning, Sant Rajinder Singh Ji Maharaj can help you take the next step in your inner growth.

A van will be going from Hartford area on Sunday, call 860 487-3597 for info!

Event is free! Van has a cost!

For more information, click here

If link doesn't work, visit www.sos.org/usa/tristate

Friday, August 31
8:00 PM Sachey Khajanae ki Khoj Public Talk in Hindi
(Discover True Treasures through Meditation)
Followed by Dinner
Location: Science of Spirituality Meditation Center, 79 County Line Road, Amityville, NY 11701

Saturday, September 1
1:00 PM Meditation Program with Maharaj Ji
Location: SOS Meditation Center, Amityville, NY
6:00 PM Key to Spiritual Wealth and Happiness Public Talk in English w/ Spanish Translation
'Boxed Dinner to Go' will be provided.
8:00 PM Holy Initiation into the Divine Light and Sound
Location: The United Palace Theater, 4140 Broadway (at 175th St.) NY, NY 10033 (Washington Heights area)

Sunday, September 2
3:00 PM Meditation: Journey to Realms of Light Public Talk in English
5:00 PM Holy Initiation into the Divine Light and Sound
Vegetarian Dinner Served after Initiation
Location: Science of Spirituality Meditation Center, 79 County Line Road, Amityville, NY 11701
item.name: Meet Sant Rajinder Singh - NY
